title: Bitcoin Mining Anno 2017
description:
Bitcoin was introduced in 2008 and has gained much popularity since then. At the time of writing the exchange rate for 1 BTC is about €1100 (or $1166), quite an increase from when you could get 1 BTC for just a few euro.
It is 29 November 2017, just eight months after writing this post, and the exchange rate has skyrocketed. The $10,000 barrier has already been broken and the €10,000 barrier is in sight.

description:
Recently, we made it super easy for you to add anyone to a sequence—right from your compose window. Now, it’s even more powerful. Starting today, you can preview and personalize the sequence you insert!
